## Installation

You can install the development version of libminerSA from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("selcant/libminerSA")
```

## Example

To get a count of installed packages in each of your library locations use the `lib_summary()` function:

```{r example}
library(libminerSA)
## basic example code
lib_summary()
```
